oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhā kitāb Ḥusn al-muḥāḍarah fī akhbār Miṣr wa-al-Qāhirah / lil-Imām al-Mujtahid al-Ḥafīẓ Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Asyūṭī : manuscript, 1844
Ḥusn al-muḥāḍarah fī akhbār Miṣr wa-al-Qāhirah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Suyūṭī , 1445-1505
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Caussin de Perceval, A. P. (Armand Pierre) , 1795-1871 (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Boards covered with decorative paper ; spine, fore edge flap and edges covered with red leather. With flap.
Written in Naskhi hand, in one column, 31 lines per page, in black and red.
According to the colophon (f. 150r), copy completed in Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1260 AH [November 1844 AD]
Wove paper. 32 x 21 cm. (21.5 X 13 cm.)
Ownership statement on fly leaf 1 signed Caussin de Perceval (Armand-Pierre Caussin de Perceval was a French Orientalist).
MS Arab SM161. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Egypt--History--640-1882
Cairo (Egypt)--History
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: حسن المحاضرة في أخبار مصر والقاهرة
هذا كتاب حسن المحاضرة في اخبار مصر و القاهرة / للإمام المجتهد الحافظ جلال الدين عبد الرحمن السيوطي : مخطوطة، 1844
